name: DevlingoFlashCardsTheWebTechnologyEdition
0:
”Alexa, open Devlingo Flash Cards”
”Add the word "promise"”
”Study Flash Cards”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: devlingo flash cards
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Devlingo Flash Cards is a great study aid for anyone interested in the web development field. 

This tool is especially helpful if:

- You are a junior developer wanting to better understand senior developers and the web development world.

- You are web technology curious, and want to learn the lingo.

- You are looking for a study tool that gives you the web technology definition of a word and not the general dictionary definition. For example, the word "promise".

This skill is Devlingo’s Web Technology edition. The over 400 words and their definitions are from Mozilla’s MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms and are available according to the terms of Mozilla’s Creative Commons CC-BY-SA 2.5 license. 

This skill is possible because of Mozilla’s contributors and Mozilla’s Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike license. Mozilla is not associated with Devlingo Flash Cards. 

About MDN: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/MDN/About
Mozilla Contributors: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/MDN/About$history
CC-BY-SA 2.5: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.5/

The glossary can be found here: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Glossary

How to use the Devlingo Flash Cards:

Devlingo gives you the ability to add flash cards with web development terms and then master those terms with a simple study game.

To open Devlingo Flash Cards, just say "Alexa, start Devlingo Flash Cards". 

- To add a word, such as immutable, say "Add the word Immutable".

- To remove the word, say "Remove the word Immutable".

- To list all of your words, just say "List my words".

- To delete all of your words, just say "Delete all of my words".

When you are ready to study your flashcards, just say "Study Flash Cards".

Devlingo Flash Cards will keep track of your score and let you know how well you did at the end of the round.

Achieve high scores repeatedly, and you will master the web lingo with Devlingo.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
